metadata.description: Canonical normalized dataset derived from docs/economy.md

coffee.name: Turbo Coffee
coffee.notes: +60 minutes bonus time for the current day, max 3 uses/day.

assistant.name: Hire Virtual Assistant
assistant.notes: Hire cost $180, adds 180 bonus minutes/day, $24 daily wage.
